Created attachment 214904 The OPF that is causing problems.

Fixed in 4ea5470acb64c5e50a16df69a077a1f6ecc63f52. Publications (of OEPBS type) will be ignored if they are not in a supported version. So an EPUB with two OEPBS root files, one in version 2 and the other in version 3 will only return the prior when calling the appropriate method in the API. However a reference to the latter will still remain in the root file list.
Closing resolved issues in released product.
